Very satisfied, thinner material, but very well made and comfortable, launders well, spot on size .
Comfortable Washes well Material is soft and not scratchy Not a tight-fitting shirt which is why it is PERFECT Already bought in few other colors Comfortable enough to even wear on a light run

Just as described. Comfy and cute
I comfortably wear an x-lg.  It does run a little big and the sleeves were a little long for my average length arms.  But I am very satisfied with comfort and stays looking nice all day.

Love these shirts. I bought a few of them as gifts. I bought these for a friend- 125lb 5’3 get a small unless your bust is 36 and up might consider a medium. They’re not winter shirts so they won’t keep you warm but the material is good quality

I bought these because of the great price and will be buying more because of the great fit and feel. I bought a large because I like my shirts baggy. I am 5 ft 7 and 129 lb. I use this underneath other shirts on a chilly winter day in Oregon and it feels so smooth against the skin and has just a little bit more warmth. I don't know if I'll actually use it by itself because it is a little revealing of my belly but as a first layer it is super comfortable and attractive. The neckline looks great under other sweaters or shirts. Definitely a great buy and fit. NOTE: I usually always wash in cool water and either hang dry or dry on cool setting. I unintentionally dried one on hot setting and it did shrink from large to a medium size. It still looks okay but I definitely like it baggier so I'm making sure not to dry on hot.

I’m 5’7, this shirt fits my long arms and torso. It’s buttery soft. I ordered the green which is really pretty. This shirt would be great for layering or wearing alone. I’ll probably order more colors!

These pullovers are incredibly soft and light and comfortably warm. There is nothing itchy-scratchy about them, so they can be the first layer on cold days with a heavier sweater over them. But they are surprisingly warm by themselves. They go through the washer and dryer perfectly, never shrink, never pull out of shape. They're worth buying in several colors.

This shirt is soft and comfy. True to size and a great piece to add to your wardrobe for any occasion. I've worn it to layer in the cold weather. My work uniform is black, as I am in catering. This shirt is plain yet, classic with great fabric quality for the price. Color didn't fade or bleed in the wash. Easy to care for. Would/will buy again.

I bought this top in black to layer under a vest or as a slightly warmer top than a regular tshirt for Texas winter. The color is solid black. The fabric is thin but not flimsy. I am usually a medium - 5’8” 150 lbs and the medium fits perfectly. It’s a straight fit - without a vest or half tuck it will be boxy. This was the fit I was looking for. The sleeves are a good length - down to the tops of my palms. Sleeves have good stretch for rolling up arms when warm. Buying in more colors.  I liked the black so much I ordered in white also. The white is a little see through, not too bad. Will be perfect for layering under a vest, which is what I was hoping for. I also like the length as it falls at my hips.

When I received it, it was in a shrink wrap and it looked really thin. I was disappointed and didn’t open it for a couple of weeks. When I did open it, I was pleasantly surprised! It’s so soft and pretty. Next step, try it on… it is very flattering and fits well. Not tight at all. The quality is impressive. This is going to be one of my favorite shirts. It can be casual or dressed up! And so comfortable!
Love the feel made well but runs small i order xxl  it fits like an xl

评论概述: Basic Tee not in bag dropped by door

Someone could have looked at it and decided if they wanted to take it. I'm glad I picked it up right away. The shirts are great but the delivery is not.
Product fit and looks as described. My only issue is that it feels a little itchy on my skin. I understand that is a personal preference thing so, I gave it 4 stars.

I bought this shirt to use for layering this fall and winter. It is very comfortable and holds its shape really well. I bought two more in different colors after my initial purchase.
I like the cut.  It fits well and the fabric looks like it will hold up well.
I wanted a long sleeve shirt not too heavy wear with jeans.  It’s thin, doesn’t wrinkle and true to fit. Since I live in Arizona it’s perfect to wear under a jacket and it’s not bulky.

Soft fabric. Zero shrinkage after cold wash medium heat tumble. Sleeves are generously long. (I always find them to short for me). I definitely plan to purchase more additional colors. I'm 5'5" 135lbs. Medium perfect fit. ✌️ ❤️
I am very pleased with the quality and warmth of these shirts. I bought 2 and will be buying more. Comfortable, great soft fabric, not heavy, fits very well and perfect for layering. Great deal!
The material is thick, color is perfect, it’s stretchy & comfortable. I ordered a large & it’s really loose but I could have gotten a medium.

I bought three of these in different colors. The thickness is perfect. Runs true to size (i am a Medium). Nice quality. Good colors and so far haven’t faded. Only drawback is not 100% cotton but extremely worth the price! Highly recommend!
